about_the_game:
Previously available only with Fate of the World pre-orders, you can now purchase the Fate of the World extras pack by itself, or as part of the Tipping Point pack. This “Extras Pack” includes the soundtrack by award-winning games composer Richard Jacques, and designer notes from the development team.

Features:

  • Soundtrack available in high quality mp3 and .flac format
  • 126 pages of designer notes
detailed_description:
Previously available only with Fate of the World pre-orders, you can now purchase the Fate of the World extras pack by itself, or as part of the Tipping Point pack. This “Extras Pack” includes the soundtrack by award-winning games composer Richard Jacques, and designer notes from the development team.

Features:

  • Soundtrack available in high quality mp3 and .flac format
  • 126 pages of designer notes

mac_requirements.minimum:
• OS: OS X version 10.6, or later.
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Intel Processor or better
  • Memory: 3 GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 1GB
  • Sound: Integrated sound

name: Fate of the World: Extras Pack

package_groups.title: Buy Fate of the World: Extras Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: 2.33Ghz processor supporting SSE2 (Pentium 4 and Athlon 64) or better
  • Memory: 2GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 1GB
  • Video Card: 512MB graphics card
  • Sound: Integrated sound
  • Direct®: 9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows Vista, 7
  • Processor: 2.33Ghz processor supporting SSE2 (Pentium 4 and Athlon 64) or better
  • Memory:3GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 1GB
  • Video Card: 512MB graphics card
  • Sound: Integrated sound
  • Direct®: 9

This “Extras Pack” includes the soundtrack by award-winning games composer Richard Jacques, and designer notes from the development team.
